text: isai VL LGV31 is an Android smartphone developed by LG Electronics for the Japanese market with the carrier au. It launched 12 December 2014 as a successor to the isai FL LGL24. au announced on 4 June 2015 that the LGV31 was one of ten au models planned to receive an upgrade to Android 5.0. ==References== ==Works cited== * ==External links== * * * Category:Android (operating system) devices Category:LG Electronics mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2014
title: Isai VL LGV31
